app.name: Algo Arcade Lab
app.description: Interactive visualizations to help you master DSA concepts

visualizer.subtitle: Select an algorithm and watch it come to life with step-by-step animations

hero.title: Master DSA Through Visualization
hero.subtitle: Interactive step-by-step animations to help you understand algorithms intuitively

interactive.title: Interactive Animations
interactive.description: Step through algorithms at your own pace with play, pause, and seek controls

customInput.title: Custom Inputs
customInput.description: Test with your own data or generate random inputs to see how algorithms behave

multiLanguage.title: Multiple Languages
multiLanguage.description: Learn in your preferred language with full i18n support

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions about Algo Arcade Lab? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.quickHelpText: Check out our FAQ section for answers to common questions about pricing, features, and getting started.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.infoCollectText: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
privacy.howWeUseText: We use the information we collect to:
howWeUseItems: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process transactions and send related information
Send you technical notices and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions
Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes:
dataSecurityItems: Encryption of sensitive data in transit and at rest
Limited access to personal information by employees
Secure payment processing through certified providers
yourRightsItems: Object to processing of your data
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and deliver personalized content. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. We will also retain and use your information as necessary to comply with legal obligations and resolve disputes.
privacy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing or using Algo Arcade Lab, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this platform.
terms.accountText: When you create an account or make a purchase, you agree to:
accountItems: Maintain the security of your account credentials
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Not share your account access with others
terms.accountNote: All payments are processed securely through our payment partners (Stripe/Razorpay). Full Access is a one-time payment that grants lifetime access to all features.
terms.licenseText: Upon purchase, you are granted a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to:
licenseItems: Access and use all algorithm visualizations and educational content
Use the code playground for personal learning and practice
Access future updates and new algorithms at no additional cost
licenseNotItems: Redistribute, resell, or sublicense access to the platform
Copy or reproduce content for commercial purposes
Share account credentials or access with others
Attempt to reverse engineer or extract source code
terms.prohibitedText: You agree not to engage in any of the following:
prohibitedItems: Violating any applicable laws or regulations
Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Interfering with or disrupting the platform's operation
Using automated systems to access the platform without permission
terms.disclaimerText: The platform is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. We are not responsible for any damages arising from your use of the platform.
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the platform. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

cancellation.title: Cancellation, Refund Policy & Terms
cancellation.importantNoticeText: Please read this policy carefully before making a purchase. All payments made to Algo Arcade Lab are final and non-refundable.
cancellation.noRefunds: 1. No Refunds on Opt-Out or Cancellation
cancellation.refundPolicyText: Once a subscription has been purchased and activated, no refunds will be issued under any circumstances.
cancellation.finalPaymentsText: All payments made towards Full Access, courses, or any other paid services are final and non-refundable.
cancellation.serviceShutdownText: In the event of an unexpected or abrupt shutdown of services, Algo Arcade Lab shall not be obligated to provide refunds for any fees, subscriptions, or payments made by users. This includes, but is not limited to:
cancellation.cancellationPolicyText: Cancellations or mid-term opt-outs are not permitted to ensure fairness and consistency for all users.
cancellation.liabilityText: Algo Arcade Lab shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages that may arise from:
liabilityItems: Use or inability to use the platform
Abrupt shutdown or discontinuation of services
cancellation.liabilityNote: This applies to all users, including those with active paid subscriptions.
cancellation.optOutText: If a user voluntarily opts out of using the service after purchase, no refund will be issued for the remaining subscription period.
cancellation.optOutNote: The responsibility of subscription management rests with the user.
cancellation.accountActivityText: Accounts exhibiting excessive or suspicious login activity, including access from an unusually high number of different IP addresses, may be:
cancellation.protectionMeasureText: This measure protects the platform from shared account misuse and unauthorized access.
cancellation.blacklistText: Users found violating Terms & Conditions may be blacklisted. Consequences include:
blacklistItems: Loss of access to all associated services
Ineligibility for future enrollments or platform usage
cancellation.blacklistNote: These actions are taken to maintain service integrity and user safety.
cancellation.legalActionText: Algo Arcade Lab reserves the right to initiate legal proceedings against individuals or accounts involved in:
legalActionItems: Abuse or exploitation of the platform
Redistribution or unauthorized sharing of content
Any actions causing harm to the service, platform, or other users
cancellation.legalActionNote: Such actions may involve reporting incidents to relevant authorities as permitted under applicable laws.
cancellation.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Cancellation Policy, please contact us at:

cheatsheet.title: Algorithm Cheatsheets
cheatsheet.subtitle: We're crafting comprehensive cheatsheets to help you quickly reference algorithms, time complexities, and key patterns during your coding interviews.
cheatsheet.feature1Text: Quick reference for Big O notation of all algorithms
cheatsheet.feature2Text: Common problem patterns and when to use which approach
cheatsheet.feature3Text: Ready-to-use code snippets in multiple languages
cheatsheet.notifyText: Join our waitlist to be the first to access our algorithm cheatsheets when they launch.
